1: 
    2: -module(beam_doc_SUITE).
    3: -export([all/0, groups/0, init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2, singleton_moduledoc/1, singleton_doc/1,
    4:          docmodule_with_doc_attributes/1, hide_moduledoc/1, docformat/1,
    5:          singleton_docformat/1, singleton_meta/1, source_path/1, behaviours/1, slogan/1,
    6:          types_and_opaques/1, callback/1, hide_moduledoc2/1,
    7:          private_types/1, export_all/1, equiv/1, spec/1, deprecated/1, warn_missing_doc/1,
    8:          doc_with_file/1, doc_with_file_error/1, all_string_formats/1,
    9:          docs_from_ast/1, spec_switch_order/1, user_defined_type/1, skip_doc/1,
   10:          no_doc_attributes/1]).
   11: 
   12: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   13: -include_lib("kernel/include/eep48.hrl").
   14: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   15: 
   16: -define(get_name(), atom_to_list(?FUNCTION_NAME)).
   17: 
   18: all() ->
   19:     [{group, documentation_generation_tests}, doc_with_file].
   20: 
   21: groups() ->
   22:     [{documentation_generation_tests, [parallel], documentation_generation_tests()}].
   23: 
   24: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
   25:     Config.
   26: 
   27: end_per_group(_, _Config) ->
   28:     ok.
   29: 
   30: documentation_generation_tests() ->
   31:     [singleton_moduledoc,
   32:      singleton_doc,
   33:      docmodule_with_doc_attributes,
   34:      hide_moduledoc,
   35:      hide_moduledoc2,
   36:      docformat,
   37:      singleton_docformat,
   38:      singleton_meta,
   39:      source_path,
   40:      behaviours,
   41:      slogan,
   42:      types_and_opaques,
   43:      callback,
   44:      private_types,
   45:      export_all,
   46:      equiv,
   47:      spec,
   48:      deprecated,
   49:      warn_missing_doc,
   50:      doc_with_file_error,
   51:      all_string_formats,
   52:      spec_switch_order,
   53:      docs_from_ast,
   54:      user_defined_type,
   55:      skip_doc,
   56:      no_doc_attributes
   57:     ].
   58: 
   59: singleton_moduledoc(Conf) ->
   60:     ModuleName = "singletonmoduledoc",
   61:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName),
   62: 
   63:     Mime = <<"text/markdown">>,
   64:     ModuleDoc = #{<<"en">> => <<"Moduledoc test module">>},
   65:     {ok, {docs_v1, _,_, Mime,ModuleDoc, _,_}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
   66:     ok.
   67: 
   68: singleton_doc(Conf) ->
   69:     ModuleName = "singletondoc",
   70:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName),
   71:     Mime = <<"text/markdown">>,
   72:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"Doc test module">>},
   73:     FooDoc = #{<<"en">> => <<"Tests multi-clauses">>},
   74:     {ok, {docs_v1, 1,_, Mime, none, _,
   75:           [{{function, foo,1},_, [<<"foo(ok)">>], FooDoc, _},
   76:            {{function, main,0},_, [<<"main()">>], Doc, _}]}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
   77:     ok.
   78: 
   79: docmodule_with_doc_attributes(Conf) ->
   80:     ModuleName = "docmodule_with_doc_attributes",
   81:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName),
   82:     Mime = <<"text/markdown">>,
   83:     ModuleDoc = #{<<"en">> => <<"Moduledoc test module">>},
   84:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"Doc test module">>},
   85:     FileDocs =  #{<<"en">> => <<"# README\n\nThis is a test">>},
   86:     {ok, #docs_v1{ anno = ModuleAnno,
   87:                    beam_language = erlang,
   88:                    format = Mime,
   89:                    module_doc = ModuleDoc,
   90:                    metadata = #{},
   91:                    docs = Docs
   92:                  }} = code:get_doc(ModName),
   93: 
   94:     
   95:     [{{function,no_docs_multi,1},NoDocsMultiAnno,[<<"no_docs_multi/1">>],none,#{}},
   96:      {{function,with_file_docs,0},FileDocsAnno, [<<"with_file_docs()">>],FileDocs,#{}},
   97:      {{function,no_docs,0},NoDocsAnno, [<<"no_docs()">>],none,#{}},
   98:      {{function,ok,0}, OkAnno, [<<"ok()">>],none,#{authors := "Someone"}},
   99:      {{function, main,_},MainAnno, _, Doc, _}] = Docs,
  100:     
  101:     ?assertEqual(5, erl_anno:line(ModuleAnno)),
  102:     ?assertEqual(10, erl_anno:line(MainAnno)),
  103:     ?assertEqual(18, erl_anno:line(OkAnno)),
  104:     ?assertEqual(21, erl_anno:line(NoDocsAnno)),
  105:     ?assertEqual(1, erl_anno:line(FileDocsAnno)),
  106:     ?assertEqual("README", filename:basename(erl_anno:file(FileDocsAnno))),
  107:     ?assertEqual(28, erl_anno:line(NoDocsMultiAnno)),
  108: 
  109:     ok.
  110: 
  111: hide_moduledoc(Conf) ->
  112:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, "hide_moduledoc"),
  113:     {ok, {docs_v1, _,_, _Mime, hidden, _,
  114:           [{{function, main, 0}, _, [<<"main()">>],
  115:             #{ <<"en">> := <<"Doc test module">> }, #{}}]}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  116:     ok.
  117: 
  118: %% TODO: crashes
  119: hide_moduledoc2(Conf) ->
  120:     ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  121:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName),
  122:     {ok, {docs_v1, _,_, _Mime, hidden, _,
  123:           [{{function,handle_call,1},{16,2},[<<"handle_call/1">>],hidden,#{}},
  124:            {{function, main, 0}, _, [<<"main()">>], hidden, #{}}]}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  125:     ok.
  126: 
  127: docformat(Conf) ->
  128:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, "docformat"),
  129:     ModuleDoc = #{<<"en">> => <<"Moduledoc test module">>},
  130:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"Doc test module">>},
  131:     {ok, {docs_v1, _,_, <<"text/asciidoc">>, ModuleDoc, Meta,
  132:           [{{function, main,_},_, _, Doc, _}]}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  133:     #{format := "text/asciidoc", deprecated := "Use something else", otp_doc_vsn := {1,0,0}, since := "1.0"} = Meta,
  134:     ok.
  135: 
  136: singleton_docformat(Conf) ->
  137:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, "singleton_docformat"),
  138:     ModuleDoc = #{<<"en">> => <<"Moduledoc test module">>},
  139:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"Doc test module\n\nMore info here">>},
  140:     {ok, {docs_v1, _,erlang, <<"text/asciidoc">>, ModuleDoc, Meta,
  141:           [{{function, main,0},_, [<<"main()">>], Doc, FunMeta}]}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  142:     #{format := <<"text/asciidoc">>,
  143:       deprecated := ~"Use something else",
  144:       otp_doc_vsn := {1,0,0},
  145:       since := ~"1.0"} = Meta,
  146:     #{authors := [<<"Beep Bop">>], equiv := <<"main/3">>, since := ~"1.0"} = FunMeta,
  147:     ok.
  148: 
  149: singleton_meta(Conf) ->
  150:     ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  151:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName),
  152:     DocMain1 = #{<<"en">> => <<"Returns always ok.">>},
  153:     Meta = #{authors => [<<"Beep Bop">>], equiv => <<"main/3">>, since => ~"1.0", source_anno => {9, 1}},
  154:     {ok, {docs_v1, _,erlang, <<"text/markdown">>, none, #{ since := ~"1.0", source_anno := {1, 2} },
  155:           [{{function, main1,0},_, [<<"main1()">>], DocMain1, #{equiv := <<"main(_)">>,
  156:                                                                 since := ~"1.1",
  157:                                                                 source_anno := {19, 1}}},
  158:            {{function, main,0},_, [<<"main()">>], none, Meta}]}}
  159:         = code:get_doc(ModName),
  160:     ok.
  161: 
  162: source_path(Conf) ->
  163:     ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  164:     % Includes absolute source path by default
  165:     FilePath = filename:absname(data_file_path(Conf, ModuleName)),
  166:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName),
  167:     {ok, {docs_v1, _, _, _, _, Meta1, _}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  168:     #{source_path := FilePath} = Meta1,
  169:     % Excludes source path when deterministic
  170:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, [deterministic]),
  171:     {ok, {docs_v1, _, _, _, _, Meta2, _}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  172:     false = is_map_key(source_path, Meta2),
  173:     ok.
  174: 
  175: behaviours(Conf) ->
  176:     ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  177:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName),
  178:     {ok, {docs_v1, _, _, _, _, #{behaviours := [gen_event, gen_server]}, _}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  179:     ok.
  180: 
  181: slogan(Conf) ->
  182:   ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  183:   {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName),
  184:   Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"Returns ok.">>},
  185:   BarDoc = #{ <<"en">> => <<"foo()\nNot a slogan since foo =/= bar">> },
  186:   NoSloganDoc = #{ <<"en">> => <<"Not a slogan\n\nTests slogans in multi-clause">>},
  187:   {ok, {docs_v1, _,_, _, none, _,
  188:           [Connect, MulticlauseSloganIgnored, SpecNoDocSlogan, NoDocSlogan,
  189:            Slogan2, Slogan1, NoSlogan, Bar, Main]}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  190: 
  191:   {{function,connect,2},_,
  192:    [<<"connect(TCPSocket, TLSOptions)">>],none,#{equiv := <<"connect/3">>,since := <<"OTP R14B">>}} = Connect,
  193:   {{function,spec_multiclause_slogan_ignored,1},_,[<<"spec_multiclause_slogan_ignored(X)">>],none,#{}} = MulticlauseSloganIgnored,
  194:   {{function, spec_no_doc_slogan, 1}, _, [<<"spec_no_doc_slogan(Y)">>], none, #{}} = SpecNoDocSlogan,
  195:   {{function, no_doc_slogan, 1}, _, [<<"no_doc_slogan(X)">>], none, #{}}= NoDocSlogan,
  196:   {{function, spec_slogan, 2}, _, [<<"spec_slogan(Y, Z)">>], _, #{}} = Slogan2,
  197:   {{function, spec_slogan, 1}, _, [<<"spec_slogan(Y)">>], _, #{}} = Slogan1,
  198:   {{function, no_slogan,1},_,[<<"no_slogan/1">>], NoSloganDoc, #{}} = NoSlogan,
  199:   {{function, bar,0},_,[<<"bar()">>], BarDoc, #{}} = Bar,
  200:   {{function, main,1},_,[<<"main(Foo)">>], Doc, #{}} = Main,
  201:   ok.
  202: 
  203: types_and_opaques(Conf) ->
  204:     ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  205:     {ok, ModName, Warnings} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, [return_warnings]),
  206:     TypeDoc = #{<<"en">> => <<"Represents the name of a person.">>},
  207:     GenericsDoc = #{<<"en">> => <<"Tests generics">>},
  208:     OpaqueDoc = #{<<"en">> =>
  209:                       <<"Represents the name of a person that cannot be named.">>},
  210:     MaybeOpaqueDoc = #{<<"en">> => <<"mmaybe(X) ::= nothing | X.\n\nRepresents a maybe type.">>},
  211: 
  212:     {ok, {docs_v1, _,_, _, none, _,
  213:           [%% Type Definitions
  214:            Public, Intermediate, HiddenNoWarnType, HiddenType, OtherPrivateType, MyPrivateType,
  215:            MyMap, StateEnter, CallbackMode,CallbackResult, EncodingFunc, Three,
  216:            Two, One, Hidden, HiddenFalse, MMaybe, Unnamed, Param,NatNumber, Name,
  217:            HiddenIncludedType,
  218:            %% Functions
  219:            UsesPublic, Ignore, MapFun, PrivateEncoding, Foo
  220:           ]}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  221: 
  222:     {{type,public,0},{125,2},[<<"public()">>],none,#{exported := true, source_anno := {125, 2}}} = Public,
  223:     {{type,intermediate,0},{124,2},[<<"intermediate()">>],none,#{exported := false}} = Intermediate,
  224:     {{type,hidden_nowarn_type,0},{120,2},[<<"hidden_nowarn_type()">>],hidden,#{exported := false}} = HiddenNoWarnType,
  225:     {{type,hidden_type,0},{117,2},[<<"hidden_type()">>],hidden,#{exported := false}} = HiddenType,
  226:     {{type,my_other_private_type,0},MyOtherPrivateTypeLine,
  227:               [<<"my_other_private_type()">>],none,#{exported := false}} = OtherPrivateType,
  228:     {{type,my_private_type,0},MyPrivateTypeLine,
  229:      [<<"my_private_type()">>],none,#{exported := false}} = MyPrivateType,
  230:     {{type,mymap,0},MyMapLine,[<<"mymap()">>],none,#{exported := false}} = MyMap,
  231:     {{type,state_enter,0},StateEnterLine,[<<"state_enter()">>],none,#{exported := false}}=StateEnter,
  232:     {{type,callback_mode,0},CallbackModeLine, [<<"callback_mode()">>],none,#{exported := false}} = CallbackMode,
  233:     {{type,callback_mode_result,0},CallbackResultLine,
  234:                [<<"callback_mode_result()">>],none,#{exported := true}} = CallbackResult,
  235:     {{type,encoding_func,0},_,[<<"encoding_func()">>],none,#{exported := false}} = EncodingFunc,
  236:     {{type,three,0},_,[<<"three()">>],none,#{exported := false}} = Three,
  237:     {{type,two,0},_,[<<"two()">>],none,#{exported := false}} = Two,
  238:     {{type,one,0},_,[<<"one()">>],none,#{exported := false}} = One,
  239:     {{type,hidden,0},_,[<<"hidden()">>],hidden,#{exported := true}} = Hidden,
  240:     {{type,hidden_false,0},_,[<<"hidden_false()">>],hidden,
  241:      #{exported := true, authors := "Someone else"}} = HiddenFalse,
  242:     {{type, mmaybe,1},_,[<<"mmaybe(X)">>], MaybeOpaqueDoc, #{authors := "Someone else", exported := true}} = MMaybe,
  243:     {{type, unnamed,0},{30,2},[<<"unnamed()">>], OpaqueDoc,
  244:      #{equiv := <<"non_neg_integer()">>, exported := true}} = Unnamed,
  245:     {{type, param,1},_,[<<"param(X)">>], GenericsDoc,
  246:      #{equiv := <<"madeup()">>, exported := true}} = Param,
  247:     {{type, natural_number,0},_,[<<"natural_number()">>], none, #{since := "1.0", equiv := <<"non_neg_integer/0">>, exported := true}} = NatNumber,
  248:     {{type, name,1},_,[<<"name(_)">>], TypeDoc, #{exported := true}} = Name,
  249:     {{type, hidden_included_type, 0}, _, _, hidden, #{exported := false }} = HiddenIncludedType,
  250: 
  251:     {{function,uses_public,0},{128,1},[<<"uses_public()">>],none,#{}} = UsesPublic,
  252:     {{function,ignore_type_from_hidden_fun,0},_,[<<"ignore_type_from_hidden_fun()">>],hidden,#{}} = Ignore,
  253:     {{function,map_fun,0},_,[<<"map_fun()">>],none,#{}} = MapFun,
  254:     {{function,private_encoding_func,2},_,[<<"private_encoding_func(Data, Options)">>],none,#{}} = PrivateEncoding,
  255:     {{function,foo,0},_,[<<"foo()">>],none,#{}} = Foo,
  256: 
  257:     ?assertEqual(103, erl_anno:line(MyOtherPrivateTypeLine)),
  258:     ?assertEqual(102, erl_anno:line(MyPrivateTypeLine)),
  259:     ?assertEqual(99, erl_anno:line(MyMapLine)),
  260:     ?assertEqual(96, erl_anno:line(StateEnterLine)),
  261:     ?assertEqual(95, erl_anno:line(CallbackModeLine)),
  262:     ?assertEqual(93, erl_anno:line(CallbackResultLine)),
  263: 
  264:     [{File, Ws}, {HrlFile, HrlWs}] = Warnings,
  265:     ?assertEqual("types_and_opaques.erl", filename:basename(File)),
  266:     ?assertEqual({{117,2}, beam_doc,
  267:                   {hidden_type_used_in_exported_fun,{hidden_type,0}}}, lists:nth(4, Ws)),
  268: 
  269:     ?assertEqual("types_and_opaques.hrl", filename:basename(HrlFile)),
  270:     ?assertEqual({{1,2}, beam_doc,
  271:                   {hidden_type_used_in_exported_fun,{hidden_included_type,0}}}, lists:nth(1, HrlWs)),
  272: 
  273:     {ok, ModName, [_]} =
  274:         default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, [return_warnings, nowarn_hidden_doc, nowarn_unused_type]),
  275: 
  276:     ok.
  277: 
  278: callback(Conf) ->
  279:     ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  280:     {ok, ModName, [{File,Warnings}]} =
  281:         default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, [return_warnings, report]),
  282:     Doc = #{<<"en">> => <<"Callback fn that always returns ok.">>},
  283:     ImpCallback = #{<<"en">> => <<"This is a test">>},
  284:     FunctionDoc = #{<<"en">> => <<"all_ok()\n\nCalls all_ok/0">>},
  285:     ChangeOrder = #{<<"en">> => <<"Test changing order">>},
  286:     {ok, {docs_v1, _,_, _, none, _,
  287:           [{{callback,nowarn,1},{39,2},[<<"nowarn(Arg)">>],hidden,#{source_anno := {41, 2}}},
  288:            {{callback,warn,0},{36,2},[<<"warn()">>],hidden,#{}},
  289:            {{callback,bounded,1},_,[<<"bounded(X)">>],none,#{}},
  290:            {{callback,multi,1},_,[<<"multi(Argument)">>],
  291:             #{ <<"en">> := <<"A multiclause callback with slogan docs">> },#{}},
  292:            {{callback,multi_no_slogan,1},_,[<<"multi_no_slogan/1">>],none,#{}},
  293:            {{callback,ann,1},_,[<<"ann(X)">>],none,#{}},
  294:            {{callback,param,1},_,[<<"param(X)">>],none,#{}},
  295:            {{callback, change_order,0},_,[<<"change_order()">>], ChangeOrder,
  296:             #{equiv := <<"ok()">>}},
  297:            {{callback, all_ok,0},_,[<<"all_ok()">>], Doc, #{}},
  298:            {{function, main2,0},_,[<<"main2()">>], #{<<"en">> := <<"Second main">>},
  299:             #{equiv := <<"main()">>}},
  300:            {{function, main,0},_,[<<"main()">>], FunctionDoc, #{}},
  301:            {{function, all_ok,0},_, [<<"all_ok()">>],ImpCallback,
  302:             #{equiv := <<"ok/0">>}}
  303:           ]}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  304: 
  305:     ?assertEqual("callback.erl", filename:basename(File)),
  306:     io:format("Warnings: ~p~n", [Warnings]),
  307:     ?assertEqual(1, length(Warnings)),
  308:     ?assertMatch({{36,2},beam_doc,{hidden_callback,{warn,0}}}, lists:nth(1, Warnings)),
  309: 
  310:     {ok, ModName, []} =
  311:         default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, [return_warnings, report, nowarn_hidden_doc]),
  312: 
  313:     ok.
  314: 
  315: private_types(Conf) ->
  316:     ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  317:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName),
  318: 
  319:     {ok, {docs_v1, _,_, _, none, _,
  320:           [
  321:            %% Types
  322:            RemoteTypeT, TupleT, RecordAT, RecordInlineT,
  323:            MapValue2T, MapKey2T, MapValueT, MapKeyT,
  324:            FunRet2T, FunRetT, FunT, Complex, BoundedRetT,
  325:            ArgT, BoundedArgT, Private, HiddenExportT, PrivateCBT,
  326:            OpaqueT, PublicT, PrivateT,
  327:            %% Callbacks
  328:            CBar,
  329:            %% Functions
  330:            Bounded, HiddenTypeExposed, Hidden, Bar]}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  331: 
  332:     ?assertMatch({{type,remote_type_t,1}, _, _, none, #{exported := false}},RemoteTypeT),
  333:     ?assertMatch({{type,tuple_t,0}, _, _, none, #{exported := false}},TupleT),
  334:     ?assertMatch({{type,record_a_t,0}, _, _, none, #{exported := false}},RecordAT),
  335:     ?assertMatch({{type,record_inline_t,0}, _, _, none, #{exported := false}},RecordInlineT),
  336:     ?assertMatch({{type,map_value_2_t,0}, _, _, none, #{exported := false}},MapValue2T),
  337:     ?assertMatch({{type,map_key_2_t,0}, _, _, none, #{exported := false}},MapKey2T),
  338:     ?assertMatch({{type,map_value_t,0}, _, _, none, #{exported := false}},MapValueT),
  339:     ?assertMatch({{type,map_key_t,0}, _, _, none, #{exported := false}},MapKeyT),
  340:     ?assertMatch({{type,fun_ret_2_t,0}, _, _, none, #{exported := false}},FunRet2T),
  341:     ?assertMatch({{type,fun_ret_t,0}, _, _, none, #{exported := false}},FunRetT),
  342:     ?assertMatch({{type,fun_t,0}, _, _, none, #{exported := false}},FunT),
  343:     ?assertMatch({{type,complex,1}, _, _, none, #{exported := true}},Complex),
  344:     ?assertMatch({{type,bounded_ret_t,0}, _, _, none, #{exported := false}},BoundedRetT),
  345:     ?assertMatch({{type,arg_t,0}, _, _, none, #{exported := false}},ArgT),
  346:     ?assertMatch({{type,bounded_arg_t,0}, _, _, none, #{exported := false}},BoundedArgT),
  347:     ?assertMatch({{type,private,0}, {30,2}, [<<"private()">>], hidden, #{exported := false}},Private),
  348:     ?assertMatch({{type,hidden_export_t,0},_,[<<"hidden_export_t()">>],hidden,#{exported := true}},HiddenExportT),
  349:     ?assertMatch({{type,private_cb_t,0},_,_,none,#{exported := false}},PrivateCBT),
  350:     ?assertMatch({{type,opaque_t,0},_, [<<"opaque_t()">>], none,#{ exported := true}},OpaqueT),
  351:     ?assertMatch({{type,public_t,0},_, [<<"public_t()">>], none,#{ exported := true}},PublicT),
  352:     ?assertMatch({{type,private_t,0},_, [<<"private_t()">>], none,#{ exported := false}},PrivateT),
  353:     ?assertMatch({{callback,bar,1},_,_,none,#{}},CBar),
  354:     ?assertMatch({{function,bounded,2},_,_,none,#{}},Bounded),
  355:     ?assertMatch({{function,hidden_type_exposed,0},{34,1},[<<"hidden_type_exposed()">>],none,#{}},HiddenTypeExposed),
  356:     ?assertMatch({{function,hidden,0},_,[<<"hidden()">>],hidden,#{}},Hidden),
  357:     ?assertMatch({{function,bar,0},_,[<<"bar()">>],none,#{}},Bar),
  358: 
  359:     ok.
  360: 
  361: 
  362: export_all(Conf) ->
  363:     ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  364:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName),
  365:     ImpCallback = #{<<"en">> => <<"This is a test">>},
  366:     FunctionDoc = #{<<"en">> => <<"all_ok()\n\nCalls all_ok/0">>},
  367:     {ok, {docs_v1, _,_, _, none, _,
  368:           [{{function, main2,0},_,[<<"main2()">>], #{<<"en">> := <<"Second main">>},
  369:             #{equiv := <<"main()">>}},
  370:            {{function, main,0},_,[<<"main()">>], FunctionDoc, #{}},
  371:            {{function, all_ok,0},_, [<<"all_ok()">>],ImpCallback,
  372:             #{equiv := <<"ok/0">>}}
  373:           ]}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  374:     ok.
  375: 
  376: equiv(Conf) ->
  377:     ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  378:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName),
  379:     {ok, {docs_v1, _,_, _, none, _,
  380:           [{{function, main, 2},_,[<<"main(A, B)">>], none,
  381:             #{ }},
  382:             {{function, main, 1},_,[<<"main(A)">>], none,
  383:              #{ equiv := <<"main(A, 1)">> }}
  384:           ]}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  385:     ok.
  386: 
  387: spec(Conf) ->
  388:     ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  389:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName),
  390:     {ok, {docs_v1, _,_, _, #{ ~"en" := ~"" }, _,
  391:           [{{type,no,0},_,[<<"no()">>],none,#{exported := false}},
  392:            {{type,yes,0},_,[<<"yes()">>],none,#{exported := false}},
  393:            {{callback,me,1},_,[<<"me/1">>],none,#{}},
  394:            {{function,baz,1},_,[<<"baz(X)">>],none,#{}},
  395:            {{function,foo,1},_,[<<"foo(X)">>],none,#{}}]}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  396:     ok.
  397: 
  398: user_defined_type(Conf) ->
  399:     ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  400:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName),
  401:     {ok, {docs_v1, _,_, _, #{ ~"en" := ~"" }, _, []}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  402:     ok.
  403: 
  404: deprecated(Conf) ->
  405:     ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  406:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName),
  407:     {ok, {docs_v1, _,_, _, none, _,
  408:           [{{type,test,1},_,[<<"test(N)">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"the type deprecated:test(_) is deprecated; Deprecation reason">>}},
  409:            {{type,test,0},_,[<<"test()">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"the type deprecated:test() is deprecated; see the documentation for details">>}},
  410:            {{callback,test,1},_,[<<"test(N)">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"the callback deprecated:test(_) is deprecated; Deprecation reason">>}},
  411:            {{callback,test,0},_,[<<"test()">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"Meta reason">>}},
  412:            {{function,test,2},_,[<<"test(N, M)">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"Meta reason">>}},
  413:            {{function,test,1},_,[<<"test(N)">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"deprecated:test/1 is deprecated; Deprecation reason">>}},
  414:            {{function,test,0},_,[<<"test()">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"deprecated:test/0 is deprecated; see the documentation for details">>}}]}} =
  415:         code:get_doc(ModName),
  416: 
  417:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, [{d,'TEST_WILDCARD'},
  418:                                                             {d, 'REASON', next_major_release}]),
  419:     {ok, {docs_v1, _,_, _, none, _,
  420:           [{{type,test,1},_,[<<"test(N)">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"the type deprecated:test(_) is deprecated; see the documentation for details">>}},
  421:            {{type,test,0},_,[<<"test()">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"the type deprecated:test() is deprecated; see the documentation for details">>}},
  422:            {{callback,test,1},_,[<<"test(N)">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"the callback deprecated:test(_) is deprecated; will be removed in the next major release. See the documentation for details">>}},
  423:            {{callback,test,0},_,[<<"test()">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"Meta reason">>}},
  424:            {{function,test,2},_,[<<"test(N, M)">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"Meta reason">>}},
  425:            {{function,test,1},_,[<<"test(N)">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"deprecated:test/1 is deprecated; will be removed in the next major release. See the documentation for details">>}},
  426:            {{function,test,0},_,[<<"test()">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"deprecated:test/0 is deprecated; see the documentation for details">>}}]}} =
  427:         code:get_doc(ModName),
  428: 
  429:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, [{d,'ALL_WILDCARD'},
  430:                                                             {d,'REASON',next_version},
  431:                                                             {d,'TREASON',eventually}]),
  432:     {ok, {docs_v1, _,_, _, none, _,
  433:           [{{type,test,1},_,[<<"test(N)">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"the type deprecated:test(_) is deprecated; will be removed in a future release. See the documentation for details">>}},
  434:            {{type,test,0},_,[<<"test()">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"the type deprecated:test() is deprecated; see the documentation for details">>}},
  435:            {{callback,test,1},_,[<<"test(N)">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"the callback deprecated:test(_) is deprecated; will be removed in the next version. See the documentation for details">>}},
  436:            {{callback,test,0},_,[<<"test()">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"Meta reason">>}},
  437:            {{function,test,2},_,[<<"test(N, M)">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"Meta reason">>}},
  438:            {{function,test,1},_,[<<"test(N)">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"deprecated:test/1 is deprecated; will be removed in the next version. See the documentation for details">>}},
  439:            {{function,test,0},_,[<<"test()">>],none,#{deprecated := <<"deprecated:test/0 is deprecated; see the documentation for details">>}}]}} =
  440:         code:get_doc(ModName),
  441:     ok.
  442: 
  443: warn_missing_doc(Conf) ->
  444: 
  445:     warn_missing_doc(Conf, [function, type, callback], [warn_missing_doc]),
  446:     warn_missing_doc(Conf, [function], [warn_missing_doc_functions]),
  447:     warn_missing_doc(Conf, [function, type], [warn_missing_doc_functions, warn_missing_doc_types]),
  448:     warn_missing_doc(Conf, [type, callback], [warn_missing_doc_types, warn_missing_doc_callbacks]),
  449:     warn_missing_doc(Conf, [callback], [warn_missing_doc_callbacks]),
  450: 
  451:     warn_missing_doc(Conf, [type, callback], [warn_missing_doc, nowarn_missing_doc_functions]),
  452:     warn_missing_doc(Conf, [function, callback], [warn_missing_doc, nowarn_missing_doc_types]),
  453:     warn_missing_doc(Conf, [type], [warn_missing_doc, nowarn_missing_doc_callbacks, nowarn_missing_doc_functions]),
  454:     warn_missing_doc(Conf, [], [warn_missing_doc_functions, nowarn_missing_doc]),
  455: 
  456:     ok.
  457: 
  458: warn_missing_doc(Conf, ExpectedWarnings, Options) ->
  459:     ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  460:     {ok, ModName, Ws} =
  461:         default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, [return_warnings, report | Options]),
  462: 
  463:     {ok, {docs_v1, _,_, _, none, _,
  464:           [{{type,test,1},_,[<<"test(N)">>],none,_},
  465:            {{type,test,0},_,[<<"test()">>],none,_},
  466:            {{callback,test,0},_,[<<"test()">>],none,_},
  467:            {{function,test,1},_,[<<"test(N)">>],none,_},
  468:            {{function,test,0},_,[<<"test()">>],none,_},
  469:            {{function,test,2},_,[<<"test(N, M)">>],none,_}]}
  470:     } = code:get_doc(ModName),
  471: 
  472:     case ExpectedWarnings of
  473:         [] ->
  474:             ?assertEqual([],Ws);
  475:         _ ->
  476:             [{File,Warnings} | Hrl] = Ws,
  477:             ExpectedWarningCount = 1 + lists:sum(
  478:                                          lists:flatten(
  479:                                            [[2 || lists:member(type, ExpectedWarnings)],
  480:                                             [1 || lists:member(callback, ExpectedWarnings)],
  481:                                             [2 || lists:member(function, ExpectedWarnings)]])),
  482: 
  483:             ?assertEqual("warn_missing_doc.erl", filename:basename(File)),
  484:             ?assertEqual(ExpectedWarningCount, length(Warnings)),
  485:             ?assertMatch({1, beam_doc, missing_moduledoc}, lists:nth(1, Warnings)),
  486:             TypePos =
  487:                 case lists:member(type, ExpectedWarnings) of
  488:                     true ->
  489:                         ?assertMatch({{6,2}, beam_doc, {missing_doc, {type,test,0}}}, lists:nth(2, Warnings)),
  490:                         ?assertMatch({{7,2}, beam_doc, {missing_doc, {type,test,1}}}, lists:nth(3, Warnings)),
  491:                         4;
  492:                     false ->
  493:                         2
  494:                 end,
  495: 
  496:             CBPos =
  497:                 case lists:member(callback, ExpectedWarnings) of
  498:                     true ->
  499:                         ?assertMatch({{9,2}, beam_doc, {missing_doc, {callback,test,0}}}, lists:nth(TypePos, Warnings)),
  500:                         TypePos + 1;
  501:                     false ->
  502:                         TypePos
  503:                 end,
  504: 
  505:             case lists:member(function, ExpectedWarnings) of
  506:                 true ->
  507:                     ?assertMatch({{13,1}, beam_doc, {missing_doc, {function,test,0}}}, lists:nth(CBPos, Warnings)),
  508:                     ?assertMatch({{14,1}, beam_doc, {missing_doc, {function,test,1}}}, lists:nth(CBPos+1, Warnings)),
  509:                     [{HrlFile, HrlWarnings}] = Hrl,
  510:                     ?assertEqual("warn_missing_doc.hrl", filename:basename(HrlFile)),
  511:                     ?assertEqual(1, length(HrlWarnings)),
  512:                     ?assertMatch({{2,1}, beam_doc, {missing_doc, {function,test,2}}}, lists:nth(1, HrlWarnings));
  513:                 false ->
  514:                     ok
  515:             end
  516:     end.
  517: 
  518: doc_with_file(Conf) ->
  519:     ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  520:     {ok, Cwd} = file:get_cwd(),
  521:     try
  522:         ok = file:set_cwd(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Conf)),
  523:         {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, [{i, "./folder"}]),
  524:         {ok, {docs_v1, ModuleAnno,_, _, #{<<"en">> := <<"# README\n\nThis is a test">>}, _,
  525:               [{{type,bar,1},_,[<<"bar(X)">>],none,#{exported := false}},
  526:                {{type,foo,1},_,[<<"foo(X)">>],none,#{exported := true}},
  527:                {{type,private_type_exported,0},_,[<<"private_type_exported()">>],
  528:                 #{<<"en">> := <<"# TYPES\n\nTest">>}, #{exported := false}},
  529:                {{function,main2,1},Main2Anno,[<<"main2(I)">>],
  530:                 #{<<"en">> := <<"# File\n\ntesting fetching docs from other folders">>}, #{}},
  531:                {{function,main,1},_,[<<"main(Var)">>],
  532:                 #{<<"en">> := <<"# Fun\n\nTest importing function">>},#{}}]}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  533: 
  534:         ?assertEqual(1, erl_anno:line(ModuleAnno)),
  535:         ?assertEqual(1, erl_anno:line(Main2Anno)),
  536:         ?assertEqual("./folder/FILE", erl_anno:file(Main2Anno)),
  537:         ok
  538:     after
  539:         ok = file:set_cwd(Cwd)
  540:     end.
  541: 
  542: doc_with_file_error(Conf) ->
  543:     ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  544:     {ok, _, Warnings} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, [return_warnings]),
  545: 
  546:     [{File,
  547:       [{{6,2},epp,{moduledoc,file,"doesnotexist"}},
  548:        {{8,2},epp,{doc,file,"doesnotexist"}},
  549:        {{11,2},epp,{doc,file,"doesnotexist"}}]}] = Warnings,
  550: 
  551:     ?assertEqual("doc_with_file_error.erl", filename:basename(File)),
  552: 
  553:     {ok, _} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, [report]),
  554: 
  555:     ok.
  556: 
  557: all_string_formats(Conf) ->
  558:     ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  559:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName),
  560: 
  561:     {ok, {docs_v1, _ModuleAnno,_, _, #{<<"en">> := <<"Moduledoc test module">>}, _,
  562:               [
  563:                {{function,six,0},_,_, #{<<"en">> := <<"all_string_formats-all_string_formats">>}, #{}},
  564:                {{function,five,0},_,_, #{<<"en">> := <<"all_string_formats-Doc module">>}, #{}},
  565:                {{function,four,0},_,_, #{<<"en">> := <<"Doc test mödule"/utf8>>}, #{}},
  566:                {{function,three,0},_,_, #{<<"en">> := <<"Doctestmodule">>}, #{}},
  567:                {{function,two,0},_,_, #{<<"en">> := <<"Doc test module">>}, #{}},
  568:                {{function,one,0},_,_, #{<<"en">> := <<"Doc test module">>}, #{}}
  569:               ]}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  570:     ok.
  571: 
  572: spec_switch_order(Conf) ->
  573:   ModuleName = ?get_name(),
  574:     {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName),
  575: 
  576:     {ok, {docs_v1, _ModuleAnno,_, _, _, _,
  577:           [NotFalse, Other, Bar, Foo]}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  578:   {{function,not_false,0}, {52,1}, [<<"not_false()">>], none,#{}} = NotFalse,
  579:   {{function,other,0},{36,2},[<<"other()">>],hidden,#{}} = Other,
  580:   {{function,bar,1},{30,2},[<<"bar(X)">>],hidden,#{}} = Bar,
  581:   {{function,foo,1}, {22, 2}, [<<"foo(Var)">>], #{ <<"en">> := <<"Foo does X">> }, #{}} = Foo.
  582: 
  583: skip_doc(Conf) ->
  584:   ModuleName =?get_name(),
  585:   {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, [no_docs]),
  586: 
  587:   {ok,{docs_v1,0,erlang,<<"application/erlang+html">>,none,
  588:      #{generated := true,
  589:        otp_doc_vsn := {1,0,0}},
  590:        [{{function,main,0},{8,1},[<<"main/0">>],none,#{}},
  591:         {{function,foo,1},{16,1},[<<"foo/1">>],none,#{}}]}} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  592: 
  593:   {error, missing} =
  594:       code:get_doc(ModName, #{ sources => [eep48] }),
  595: 
  596:   {ok, _ModName} = compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, [report, return_errors, no_docs]),
  597:   {error, missing} = code:get_doc(ModName),
  598:   ok.
  599: 
  600: no_doc_attributes(Conf) ->
  601:   ModuleName =?get_name(),
  602:   {ok, ModName} = default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, []),
  603: 
  604:   {error, missing} =
  605:       code:get_doc(ModName, #{ sources => [eep48] }),
  606: 
  607:   ok.
  608: 
  609: docs_from_ast(_Conf) ->
  610:     Code = """
  611:       -module(test).
  612:       -moduledoc "moduledoc".
  613:       -export([main/0]).
  614:       -doc "main".
  615:       main() -> ok.
  616:       """,
  617: 
  618:     {ok, test, BeamCode} = compile:forms(scan_and_parse(Code),[debug_info]),
  619:     {ok, {test, [{documentation, Docs }]}} = beam_lib:chunks(BeamCode, [documentation]),
  620: 
  621:     ?assertMatch(
  622:        #docs_v1{ module_doc = #{ <<"en">> := <<"moduledoc">> },
  623:                  anno = 2,
  624:                  docs = [{{function,main,0}, 4, _, #{ <<"en">> := <<"main">> }, _}]},
  625:        Docs),
  626: 
  627:     check_no_doc_attributes(BeamCode),
  628: 
  629:     {ok, test, BeamCodeWSource} = compile:forms(scan_and_parse(Code),[beam_docs, debug_info, {source, "test.erl"}]),
  630:     {ok, {test, [{documentation, DocsWSource }]}} = beam_lib:chunks(BeamCodeWSource, [documentation]),
  631: 
  632:     ?assertMatch(
  633:        #docs_v1{ module_doc = #{ <<"en">> := <<"moduledoc">> },
  634:                  anno = 2,
  635:                  docs = [{{function,main,0}, 4,
  636:                           _, #{ <<"en">> := <<"main">> }, _}]},
  637:        DocsWSource),
  638:     check_no_doc_attributes(BeamCodeWSource),
  639:     ok.
  640: 
  641: scan_and_parse(Code) ->
  642:     {ok, Toks, _} = erl_scan:string(Code),
  643:     parse(Toks).
  644: 
  645: parse([]) -> [];
  646: parse(Toks) ->
  647:     {Form, [Dot | Rest]} = lists:splitwith(fun(E) -> element(1,E) =/= dot end, Toks),
  648:     {ok, F} = erl_parse:parse_form(Form ++ [Dot]),
  649:     [F | parse(Rest)].
  650: 
  651: compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, ExtraOpts) ->
  652:     Filename = data_file_path(Conf, ModuleName),
  653:     io:format("Compiling: ~ts~n~p~n",[Filename, ExtraOpts]),
  654:     case compile:file(Filename, ExtraOpts) of
  655:         Res when element(1, Res) =:= ok ->
  656:             ModName = element(2, Res),
  657:             case lists:search(fun (X) -> X =:= no_docs end, ExtraOpts) of
  658:               false when length(ExtraOpts) > 0 ->
  659:                 check_no_doc_attributes(code:which(ModName)),
  660:                 Res;
  661:               _ ->
  662:                 Res
  663:             end;
  664:         Else ->
  665:             Else
  666:     end.
  667: 
  668: data_file_path(Conf, ModuleName) ->
  669:     ErlModName = ModuleName ++ ".erl",
  670:     filename:join(proplists:get_value(data_dir, Conf), ErlModName).
  671: 
  672: default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName) ->
  673:   default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, []).
  674: default_compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, ExtraOpts) ->
  675:   compile_file(Conf, ModuleName, [report, return_errors, debug_info] ++ ExtraOpts).
  676: 
  677: 
  678: %% Verify that all doc and moduledoc attributes are stripped from debug_info
  679: check_no_doc_attributes(Mod) ->
  680:     {ok, {_ModName,
  681:           [{debug_info,
  682:             {debug_info_v1,erl_abstract_code,
  683:              {AST, Opts}}}]}} = beam_lib:chunks(Mod, [debug_info]),
  684:     false = lists:search(
  685:               fun(E) ->
  686:                       element(1,E) == attribute
  687:                           andalso
  688:                             (element(3,E) == doc orelse element(3,E) == moduledoc)
  689:               end, AST),
  690:     false = lists:member(no_docs, Opts),
  691:     ok.
